attributes.action: Close the Sugarhouse, Lancaster on Human Rights grounds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Sugarhouse needs to be closed for constant infringement of Human Rights (overcrowdedness as well as restriction of movement and illegal searches) as well as infringement of fire safety laws (locked fire exits etc)

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
